longDescription:
Fetch debug logs from your org by specifying a specific log ID or the number of logs to return. 
Executing this command fetches the specified log or given number of most recent logs from your default scratch org. 
To get the IDs for your debug logs, run "sfdx force:apex:log:list". 
Use the --logid parameter to return a specific log. 
Use the --number parameter to return the specified number of recent logs. 
Executing this command without parameters returns the most recent log.
logLevelDescription: logging level for this command invocation
logLevelLongDescription: Permissible values are: trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, FATAL
logIDDescription: id of the log to display
numberDescription: number of most recent logs to display
outputDirDescription: folder for saving the log files
outputDirLongDescription: The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.
missing_auth_error: Must pass a username and/or OAuth options when creating an AuthInfo instance.
